programmes.show_description: (2022) Lo-fi sci-fi. In 1940, two sisters invent a contraption that intercepts future broadcasts. But it inadvertently creates an alternate timeline in which the Nazis win the war. Oops.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
(2020) Touching adventure with Harrison Ford, based on Jack London's classic novel. A big, friendly hound finds himself unwittingly travelling across late 19th-century North America.
(1952) Screwball comedy starring Cary Grant as a scientist who drinks the elixir of youth and starts acting the fool, as does his strait-laced wife (Ginger Rogers).
(2022) Family comedy with Michael Peña. A young lad discovers that his slacker dad is a superhero. And before he's got used to the idea, he must foil a villain's plot to bring his dad down.
(2004) All-action thriller. Queen Latifah stars as the driver of the fastest taxi in New York, who teams up with an inept cop (Jimmy Fallon) to catch a team of female bank-robbers.
Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.
(1997) Action thriller starring Pierce Brosnan and Linda Hamilton. The inhabitants of a volcano-side resort unwisely ignore a scientist's warning about its imminent eruption.
(2014) Thriller. Denzel Washington stars as an ex-soldier who comes out of retirement to help a teenage sex worker who's been assaulted by her pimp.
(1996) Peter Jackson's comedy horror stars Michael J Fox as a psychic investigator in a town that has more ghouls and ghosties than you can shake a spirit stick at. But is he a fraud?
(2020) Groundhog day shoot 'em up with Frank Grillo, Naomi Watts and Mel Gibson. Ray gets killed every day. Can he escape by unravelling the mystery of why a bunch of people want him dead?
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
(1942) Ginger Rogers stars in this comedy of romantic misadventure. A woman poses as a girl to get a cheap rail fare. But things get awkward when she falls for a man who helps her out.
(1995) Romantic drama based on Arthurian legend, starring Richard Gere, Sean Connery and Julia Ormond. Can nomadic swordsman Lancelot contain his love for King Arthur's fiancée?
(2019) Adventure comedy sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart and Karen Gillan. The old school pals enter the Jumanji video game again to save their friend.
(2015) Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance star in Steven Spielberg's Cold War spy drama. After gaining notoriety for defending a Soviet spy, a US lawyer then tries to free a CIA pilot.
Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.
(2006) Pulsating sci-fi action with Denzel Washington and Val Kilmer. An AFT agent uses new technology to reach back in time, stop a ferry bombing, and save the love of his life. Simple.
(2022) Michael Bay's high-octane thriller with Jake Gyllenhaal. After a bodged heist, two brothers try to evade the LAPD in an ambulance, while a paramedic operates on a cop in the back.
